Chapter 4557 - Chapter 4557: 4,556 Heaven-Connecting Techniques

Chapter 4557: 4,556 heaven-connecting techniques

“Ladies!”

Wang Xian came before the group of girls and shouted with a smile on his face.

Although Wang Xian had been cultivating and improving his strength during this period of time, he would create clones to accompany the group of girls.

With his current strength, there was no difference between clones and his own body.

He could even create thousands of clones, each of which was his real body.

“HMPH!”

When Guan Shuqing and the rest of the girls heard Wang Xian’s frivolous words, they snorted and rolled their eyes at him before walking towards him!

“How long until our children are born? As their father, we have to prepare a gift for them!”

Wang Xian said to them with a smile on his face.

“About 108 more years. Little Xian, are you happy that you are going to be a father in more than 100 years?”

Lan Qingyue asked him with a smile on her face.

“Of course I’m happy. By the way, now that I’ve settled down, I’ll accompany all of you every day and raise a child in the future. Hehe!”

Wang Xian said with a smile!

The group of girls had wanted to have a child for a long time. However, the Dragon Palace had always been in an unstable state.

Wang Xian did not wish for his child to experience too many tribulations as soon as he was born.

Hence, he did not want the child.

Now, he was invincible and was about to have a child.

He wanted to bring some fresh blood to the Dragon Palace.

Besides, although the Dragon Palace would have to cultivate in the future, it was time for the members of the Dragon Palace to give birth to the next generation.

The number of people in the Dragon Palace was still too small.

There were only about eight million people.

For a force that controlled hundreds of universes, the number of people was pitifully small.

“Hehe, alright. Come, let us tell you about the plan for the children!”

The group of girls pulled him along and discussed the situation of the children with him!

Wang Xian listened to them one by one and agreed.

Anyway, the group of girls had already made arrangements for the children.

Of course, they would not make arrangements for their lives. However, they still had to be taught and educated well when they were children.

“Dragon King, the little princesses and princes are about to be born. This is a joyous occasion for our dragon palace. I think we should celebrate with them and invite some members of the Dragon Palace Alliance and the Justice Alliance!”

After accompanying the group of girls for a few days, Wang Xian returned to the Dragon King Palace. Prime Minister Gui immediately walked over and said with a smile on his face!

“Yes, that’s fine. Let’s celebrate properly. You can make the arrangements!”

Wang Xian nodded his head.

It had been a long time since the dragon palace held such a celebratory banquet. This time around, the birth of his child required some preparation!

It was just an ordinary celebration!

“It’s the Dragon King. Leave it to me!”

Prime Minister Gui nodded his head.

When Wang Xian saw Prime Minister Gui leaving, his face revealed a contemplative look.

Speaking of which, he had to prepare some gifts for his sons and daughters!

“There are already enough treasures and resources in the Dragon Palace. There is no lack of anything. Furthermore, the little ones are born with the strength of a ruler. What gifts should I prepare?”

Wang Xian thought for a while and had some thoughts.

His figure disappeared instantly.

When he reappeared, he was already below the land of origin.

Below the land of origin was the place where the giant beasts of Chaos lived.

There were quite a number of giant beasts of chaos here, and there were four of them at the level of chaos.

The gift that Wang Xian prepared for his child was a pet.

Of course, calling it a pet was only in his opinion.

His eyes sparkled, and his body began to teleport.

After more than ten minutes, Wang Xian arrived in front of a cave.

This was the location of a species of chaos behemoths.

Wang Xian had experienced this species of chaos behemoths once.

At that time, even with his chaos-level strength, he was forced to flee.

Even the mutated space power of an lie was disturbed.

This species.

An existence at the chaos-level.

Seven great dao-level existences.

And sixteen control level existences.

There were also 55 beginner level existences.

This was an exceptionally powerful race.

The last time, when Wang Xian arrived in front of a Great Dao Level Primal Chaos Giant Beast, he was alerted by it.

Its powerful spatial power was indeed terrifying.

However, this time, when Wang Xian appeared in front of them, he was not detected.

A group of chaos behemoths was resting here.

This was a beautiful space behemoth with cicada wings. Their bodies weren’t very big.

Their appearances were also rather beautiful.

Their bodies were emitting a thick spatial energy.

Buzz

Wang Xian’s body trembled slightly, startling the group of Chaos Behemoths.

Boom

An extremely vast spatial energy gushed out from the bodies of the chaos behemoths.

However, before they could retaliate, their bodies froze and did not move.

With Wang Xian’s strength, this extremely terrifying race of chaos behemoths could not move at all.

Their eyes were filled with horror.

“The chaos behemoths are a special product of the chaos. Their strength is extremely terrifying, but they do not have intelligence. This is the rule of the chaos.”

“This also causes them to be difficult to subdue. Take the Giant Beast Alliance for example. They are just a way of controlling them, not taming them.”

“I can’t tame them myself unless I give them intelligence!”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

It was not that easy to gain intelligence. This was equivalent to changing the rules of a living being.

It was a considerable expenditure.

Buzz

Wang Xian moved his body. With a wave of his arm, waves of chaotic energy transformed into a special soul and entered the minds of all the gigantic beasts of this gigantic beast race!

At the same time, some information about the chaos of the universe entered their minds

“Today, I will activate your spiritual intelligence. All of you will follow me.”

At the same time, Wang Xian’s voice entered their ears.

The eyes of the primal chaos behemoths that were filled with fear revealed a look of shock.

This was especially so for the strongest primal Chaos Behemoth.

It was the strongest and the fastest to receive information and convert it!

“Thank you, sir, for activating your spiritual wisdom for us. In the future, our empty cicada tribe will serve you, sir.”

This primal chaos level existence transmitted his voice with exceptional respect.

Even if his spiritual wisdom was not activated, he knew that the Wang Xian in front of him was an extremely terrifying existence that could easily crush him to death.

Now that he had helped him to activate his spiritual wisdom, he was filled with gratitude.

After all, after activating his spiritual wisdom, in his opinion, his previous life was completely muddle-headed.

“There’s no need to be so humble. In the chaos, you are also an almost invincible powerhouse. Join Our Dragon Palace in the future.”

Wang Xian instructed lightly.

His gaze swept across the Seven Great Dao level members of the empty cicada clan. He sighed a little less.

He had more than seven children. He also had to look for a few small and good-looking great dao level Space Beasts.
